SEARCH

Class ReservationSystem

java.lang.Object
ReservationSystem
public class ReservationSystem extends Object
Represents the reservation system that manages and modifies different hotels.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs the reservation system.

    • selectHotel

      public Hotel selectHotel(String hotelName)
      Selects a hotel by name.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel to select.
      Returns:
      the selected hotel, or null if no hotel with the specified name is found.

    • createHotel

      public boolean createHotel(String hotelName)
      Creates a new hotel with the specified name and adds it to the list if it doesn't already exist.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel to create.
      Returns:
      true if the hotel was created and added, false if a hotel with the same name already exists.

    • changeHotelName

      public boolean changeHotelName(Hotel hotel, String newHotelName)
      Changes the name of the selected hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the selected hotel
      newHotelName - the new name of the hotel

    • addRooms

      public boolean addRooms(Hotel hotel, String roomType, int quantity)
      Adds rooms to the selected hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the selected hotel
      roomType - the type of room to add
      quantity - the number of rooms to add
      Returns:
      'true' if the adding is successful; 'false' otherwise.

    • removeRooms

      public boolean removeRooms(Hotel hotel, String roomType, int quantity)
      Removes a specified number of rooms from the selected hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the selected hotel
      roomType - the type of rooms to remove
      quantity - the number of rooms to remove
      Returns:
      'true' if rooms are successfully removed; 'false' otherwise.

    • updateBasePrice

      public boolean updateBasePrice(Hotel hotel, double newPrice)
      Changes the price of rooms in the selected hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the selected hotel
      newPrice - the new price to set the current base price to.
      Returns:
      'true' if the base price is successfully set; 'false' otherwise.

    • modifyDatePrice

      public boolean modifyDatePrice(Hotel hotel, int date, double rate)
      Modifies the price rate at a given rate in a hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the selected hotel
      date - the date to modify
      rate - the new price rate of the date
      Returns:
      'true' if the price rate is successfully set; 'false' otherwise.

    • reserveRoom

      public boolean reserveRoom(Hotel hotel, String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, String roomType)
      Adds a reservation to the hotel for a specified guest and date range.
      Parameters:
      hotel - The selected hotel
      guestName - The name of the guest.
      checkInDate - The check-in date.
      checkOutDate - The check-out date.
      roomType - The type of room to reserve
      Returns:
      `true` if the reservation was successfully added; `false` otherwise.

    • reserveRoom

      public boolean reserveRoom(Hotel hotel, String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, String roomType, String discount)
      Adds a reservation to the hotel for a specified guest and date range with a given discount code.
      Parameters:
      hotel - The selected hotel
      guestName - The name of the guest.
      checkInDate - The check-in date.
      checkOutDate - The check-out date.
      roomType - The type of room to reserve
      discount - The discount code the guest used.
      Returns:
      `true` if the reservation was successfully added, regardless if the discount is applied or not; `false` otherwise.

    • removeReservation

      public boolean removeReservation(Hotel hotel, String guestName)
      Removes a reservation from the selected hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the selected hotel
      guestName - the name of the guest who reserved the room
      Returns:
      'true' if a reservation is successfully removed; 'false' otherwise.

    • removeHotel

      public boolean removeHotel(String hotelName)
      Removes a hotel from the hotel list.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel to be removed.
      Returns:
      'true' if a hotel is successfully removed; 'false' otherwise.
